abstract.text: Lockman is a Swift library that solves concurrent action control issues in The Composable Architecture (TCA) applications, with responsiveness, transparency, and declarative design in mind.

inlineContent.text: Lockman provides the following control strategies to address common problems in app development:
: Prevents duplicate execution of the same action
: Action control and cancellation based on priority
: Dynamic control based on runtime conditions

abstract.text: Protocol for reporting issues in the Lockman framework.
A composite strategy that coordinates locking between 2 different strategies.
Lockman is a Swift library that solves concurrent action control issues in The Composable Architecture (TCA) applications, with responsiveness, transparency, and declarative design in mind.
